Publication Abstract: Background & aims: Pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma (PDA), with its highly metastatic propensity, is one of the most lethal subtypes of pancreatic cancer. Publication Title: Clathrin light chain-conjugated drug delivery for cancer
Publication Keywords: Cancer, fluorescence imaging, Targeted Therapy, Drug Delivery
Publication Authors: Sungwook Jung, Liwei Jiang, Jing Zhao, Leonard D Shultz, Dale L Greiner, Munhyung Bae, Xiaofei Li, Farideh Ordikhani, Rui Kuai, John Joseph, Vivek Kasinath, David R Elmaleh, Reza Abdi
Publication Abstract: Targeted drug delivery systems hold the remarkable potential to improve the therapeutic index of anticancer medications markedly. Here, we report a targeted delivery platform for cancer treatment using clathrin light chain (CLC)-conjugated drugs.
